definition: extent of a rise (in prices etc)/amount of increase/growth (typically expressed as a percentage)
length (of a piece of writing)/space occupied on a printed page
not care about one's appearance (idiom)/slovenly in dress and manner
size (i.e. area) of a country, geographical region or school campus etc/(fig.) scope/extent

sentences.english: This painting of mottled bamboos is really true to life.
sentences.chinese: 这幅湘竹画得十分逼真。

sentences.english: The cartoon represented the president as a devil.
sentences.chinese: 这幅漫画把总统画成了魔鬼。

sentences.english: These two kittens on this piece of double-sided embroidery look like real ones. They are really lovable.
sentences.chinese: 这幅双面绣上的两只小猫维妙维肖，可爱极了。

sentences.english: It is supposed to look like a sunset or sunrise with clouds over water.
sentences.chinese: 这幅画作看起来就像是大海之上云雾萦绕的日出日落。

sentences.english: This naughty boy the profile that picture choosing keeps from him Todd.
sentences.chinese: 这幅调皮男孩儿的画像选自托德自己写的小传。
这幅梦幻般的照片下面掩盖着悲剧。

sentences.english: This oil-painting looks beautiful at a distance .
sentences.chinese: 这幅油画站稍远一点看很美。

sentences.english: Another homage to music legends - this time the Beatles.
sentences.chinese: 这幅壁画是献给甲壳虫乐队的传奇音乐人的。

sentences.english: British journalist who happened to see the images this morning was appalled.
sentences.chinese: 一位英国记者碰巧看到这幅广告，惊得目瞪口呆。

sentences.english: This oil painting is his pet and darling work.
sentences.chinese: 这幅油画是他的得意之作。

sentences.english: This oil painting is very pleasing .
sentences.chinese: 这幅油画可真够养眼的。

sentences.english: The act of forgiveness removes the curtain.
sentences.chinese: 宽恕可以揭去这幅帘子。

sentences.english: This book includes 80 color illustrations, which were drawn by Ah Gui, a famous cartoonist.
sentences.chinese: 本书配有80幅彩色插图，绘制者为著名漫画家阿桂。

sentences.english: Again, this is, probably not heard of this one, this is Rodin, the thinker.
sentences.chinese: 你们可能没听说过这幅，这是罗丹的《思想者》。

sentences.english: A book called Animal Locomotion collected 781 of these plates.
sentences.chinese: 《动物步态》一书收集了781幅类似的照片。

sentences.english: This composite image shows a small region of the ChandraDeep Field North.
sentences.chinese: 这幅组合图像显示了钱德拉塞卡北深空区的一小部分。

definition: to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
portrait (painting, photo etc)/(in a general sense) representation of a person/likeness
